arts.ttl: Leicester City Player Wears Unsponsored Kits in Premier League
arts.sum: In yesterday's match between Leicester City and Newcastle, young player Jeremy Monga (15 years old) took to the pitch wearing a shirt without a BC.

arts.ttl: Eddie Howe reveals Newcastle United 'fear' as Champions League race hots up
arts.sum: Leicester was always going to be difficult for us but we started the game so strongly and put ourselves in a good position. Newcastle United boss Eddie Howe admits that he feared there would be a drop off after his side won the Carabao Cup.

arts.ttl: Ruud van Nistelrooy makes brutally honest admission after X-rated blast at players
arts.sum: Ruud van Nistelrooy's Leicester have lost their last eight Premier League home games and failed to score a single goal, with Monday's 3-0 drubbing by Newcastle breaking an unwanted record

arts.ttl: What Newcastle bench roared spoke volumes as Chelsea and Man City learn truth
arts.sum: Newcastle found a way to beat Brentford, who went on to take a point off Chelsea on Sunday, and the black-and-whites scored three goals and kept a clean sheet against Leicester City on the road five days later without being anywhere near their best in either game. Newcastle will need to offer a lot more in upcoming fixtures against Manchester United, Crystal Palace and Aston Villa, but the Magpies 'go into games feeling confident we're going to win' following four victories on the bounce in the words of Barnes.

arts.ttl: Newcastle United provide double injury update on Anthony Gordon and Joe Willock
arts.sum: Eddie Howe admits that Anthony Gordon a serious doubt for the weekend clash with Manchester United at St James' Park - and Joe Willock may also be missing against the Red Devils too. When asked about Gordon's availability for the Sunday afternoon clash with Man United, Howe said: "Anthony wasn’t close (to being available to face Leicester).

arts.ttl: 'As bad as it's ever been' - Have Leicester reached a new low?
arts.sum: Leicester City earn unwanted record as they become the first side in Football League history to lose eight home games in a row without scoring. Just how bad is it?

arts.ttl: We look united – Eddie Howe happy to see Newcastle back ‘where they need to be’
arts.sum: The Magpies humbled relegation-haunted Leicester at the King Power Stadium.

arts.ttl: Leicester's Monga becomes second youngest PL player in blank shirt
arts.sum: Leicester City debutant Jeremy Monga had to wear a blank shirt because of his age when he became the second-youngest player in Premier League history.
Newcastle manager Eddie Howe is "really pleased" after his side's "massive" 3-0 Premier League win over Leicester at King Power Stadium.

arts.ttl: What Fabian Schar did seconds after almost scoring Newcastle United wonder goal
arts.sum: Fabian Schar admits he was devastated for a split second after his audacious shot from inside his own half bounced off the crossbar at the King Power Stadium. I was pretty happy that Jacob Murphy scored the goal because it was a big moment scoring so early in first half."
